[17.23 Police threatening to start arresting shall there be any assembly]

Due to the TST Clock Tower area being condoned off, the HKNP changed its rally location earlier to the East TST Centenary Garden. Upon trying to set up our stage, the police came and stopped us.

The police has warned our convenor Andy Chan Ho-tin that shall there be any attempts at setting up a rally, any responsible will be arrested on sight. There is currently a large number of police in the vicinity screening any passerby, checking their HKID and frisking them. Supporters are advised to stay clear of the area.

Follow our Facebook page or Telegram channel for the latest updates.
